name: Google Classroom [Dark Theme]
additional_info:
Dark Theme for Google Classroom

V1.0
-Everything is changed to dark theme
-Added zoom animation on some elements
-Added shadows

V1.1
-Added blur effects
-Fixed an error with the text field to post
-Fixed various text color
-Small fixes with transitions
-General fixes

V1.2
-Fixed some colors on section Work in class

If you find a bug, please leave a comment :)
